subject: Steroids
Doping (Sports)
Dietary Supplements and Herbal Remedies
lead_paragraph: The United States Anti-Doping Agency and several major North American sports leagues announced the formation of a group that will work to eliminate the sale of supplements tainted with steroids.
snippet: The United States Anti-Doping Agency and several major North American sports leagues announced the formation of a group that will work to eliminate the sale of supplements tainted with steroids.
